Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Milestones.Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to mandating the development and approval of operational safety plans
Summary: Requires the office of parks, recreation and historic preservation to develop and approve operational safety plans prior to the deployment of any employee in hazardous conditions; requires the plan to include a comprehensive risk assessment identifying potential hazards associated with the deployment, mitigation measures to address identified risks, detailed information on team composition, identification of an on-site authorized person responsible for overseeing operations, a clear chain of command, emergency contact information for all team members, and evacuation procedures.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Add ยง3.16, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to mandating the development and approval of operational safety plans
